title: Epstein showed photos of Trump with topless women, he could ruin Donald, claims author
content: According to Michael Wolff, Epstein used to believe he could ruin Trump as he had such evidence with him. Trump had the habit of pitting his own people against each other while his competition was with Epstein over women. Trump and Epstein apparently shared a girlfriend and Epstein hinted that outscoring each other on women was a "high sport" for Trump. But Epstein was also afraid of Trump knowing he would do anything to protect himself.
summary: According to Michael Wolff, Epstein used to believe he could ruin Trump as he had such evidence with him. Trump had the habit of pitting his own people against each other while his competition was with Epstein over women. Trump and Epstein apparently shared a girlfriend and Epstein hinted that outscoring each other on women was a "high sport" for Trump. But Epstein was also afraid of Trump knowing he would do anything to protect himself.

title: Meghan and Harry feel life US hasn't been what they expected: Ex-staff
content: Both Meghan and Harry became less popular after they exited the royal family and moved to California -- despite their several tell-all accounts against the family. Harry and Meghan have separated their professional ways as their Sussexes brand so far failed to make them popular in the United States. Meghan's Hollywood dream also could not take off.
summary: Both Meghan and Harry became less popular after they exited the royal family and moved to California -- despite their several tell-all accounts against the family. Harry and Meghan have separated their professional ways as their Sussexes brand so far failed to make them popular in the United States. Meghan's Hollywood dream also could not take off.

title: US Election Top 10: Decoding Donald Trump’s massive Hindu outreach on Diwali
content: Donald Trump’s Diwali outreach has stirred interest among Hindu Americans, a group traditionally loyal to Democrats. Trump’s remarks focused on condemning violence against Hindus in Bangladesh, opposing California’s caste bill, and promising stronger ties with Indian PM Narendra Modi. This approach contrasts with Kamala Harris, who has faced criticism for her perceived lack of connection to her Indian heritage. With influential figures like Vivek Ramaswamy supporting Trump, there’s a growing interest among Hindu Americans in the GOP. This election cycle reflects the increasing significance of Indian American voters as both parties vie for their support.
summary: Donald Trump’s Diwali outreach has stirred interest among Hindu Americans, a group traditionally loyal to Democrats. Trump’s remarks focused on condemning violence against Hindus in Bangladesh, opposing California’s caste bill, and promising stronger ties with Indian PM Narendra Modi. This approach contrasts with Kamala Harris, who has faced criticism for her perceived lack of connection to her Indian heritage. With influential figures like Vivek Ramaswamy supporting Trump, there’s a growing interest among Hindu Americans in the GOP. This election cycle reflects the increasing significance of Indian American voters as both parties vie for their support.

title: Nate Silver says pollsters lying about Trump-Harris close race: 'F**king finger on the scale'
content: In his final prediction, Silver said his forecasts are extremely stable. "Kamala Harris' winning odds are 46.2 per cent and Donald Trump's are 53.4 per cent. That's very close to a coin flip, in other words," Silver's prediction early Thursday said. Late on Thursday, he updated that it will be "decidedly rougher for Harris".
summary: In his final prediction, Silver said his forecasts are extremely stable. "Kamala Harris' winning odds are 46.2 per cent and Donald Trump's are 53.4 per cent. That's very close to a coin flip, in other words," Silver's prediction early Thursday said. Late on Thursday, he updated that it will be "decidedly rougher for Harris".

title: Jennifer Lopez trolled for almost crying over 'Puerto Rico joke': 'You dated P Diddy'
content: Social media users asked her what she did for Puerto Rico and that her ex-boyfriend was Diddy, arrested for sex trafficking. "If you were a regular at P.Diddy's parties, there's a 100% chance you'll endorse Kamala Harris," Catturd posted. As LeBron James also endorsed Kamala Harris, the detractors doubled down on Kamala Harris and asked how all Diddy party attendees ended up in Kamala Harris campaign.
summary: Social media users asked her what she did for Puerto Rico and that her ex-boyfriend was Diddy, arrested for sex trafficking. "If you were a regular at P.Diddy's parties, there's a 100% chance you'll endorse Kamala Harris," Catturd posted. As LeBron James also endorsed Kamala Harris, the detractors doubled down on Kamala Harris and asked how all Diddy party attendees ended up in Kamala Harris campaign.

title: Spain’s Valencia region reels from deadliest floods in decades: Why did over 205 lives end in tragedy?
content: Eastern Spain faces its deadliest flooding in Valencia, resulting in over 205 deaths. Torrential rains caused flash floods, worsened by climate change and poor urban planning. Late warnings and lack of risk awareness further contribute to the disaster, highlighting the need for improved emergency education.
summary: Eastern Spain faces its deadliest flooding in Valencia, resulting in over 205 deaths. Torrential rains caused flash floods, worsened by climate change and poor urban planning. Late warnings and lack of risk awareness further contribute to the disaster, highlighting the need for improved emergency education.

title: North Korea claims new missile as 'world’s strongest,' but experts raise concerns over size
Severe flooding in Pakistan's Sindh province has left thousands of people suffering: Rights group
content: Amnesty International criticizes the Pakistan government's failure to provide essential services for thousands of Sindhi flood victims, who face heightened health risks and lost livelihoods amid stagnant floodwaters. Many affected communities are still suffering from inaction and a lack of support months after the devastating August 2024 floods.
summary: Amnesty International criticizes the Pakistan government's failure to provide essential services for thousands of Sindhi flood victims, who face heightened health risks and lost livelihoods amid stagnant floodwaters. Many affected communities are still suffering from inaction and a lack of support months after the devastating August 2024 floods.

title: The Economist endorses VP: List of newspapers supporting Kamala Harris
content: The Economist in its endorsement said if Donald Trump wins the election, Americans would be gambling with the economy, the rule of law and international peace. Kama Harris' shortcomings, on the other hand, are ordinary and none of them are disqualifying, they said. "If The Economist had a vote, we would cat it for her," The Economist said.
summary: The Economist in its endorsement said if Donald Trump wins the election,  Americans would be gambling with the economy, the rule of law and international peace. Kama Harris' shortcomings, on the other hand, are ordinary and none of them are disqualifying, they said.  "If The Economist had a vote, we would cat it for her," The Economist said.

title: Trump says Liz Cheney should have guns trained on her face: 'Let's see how...'
content: Trump said Liz Cheney is a "very dumb individual". "She's a radical war hawk. Let's put her with a rifle standing there with nine barrels shooting at her, okay? Let’s see how she feels about it. You know when the guns are trained on her face.” “They’re all war hawks when they’re sitting in Washington in a nice building, saying, ‘Oh gee, let’s send 10,000 troops right in the mouth of the enemy,’” he added.
summary: Trump said Liz Cheney is a "very dumb individual". "She's a radical war hawk. Let's put her with a rifle standing there with nine barrels shooting at her, okay? Let’s see how she feels about it. You know when the guns are trained on her face.” “They’re all war hawks when they’re sitting in Washington in a nice building, saying, ‘Oh gee, let’s send 10,000 troops right in the mouth of the enemy,’” he added.

title: Taiwan cleans up after Typhoon Kong-rey leaves two dead
content: Workers cleared fallen trees and shop owners swept up debris in Taiwan on Friday after one of the biggest typhoons to hit the island in decades claimed at least two lives. - Chinese ship grounded - Across the island, workers were up before dawn clearing trees, branches and other debris from roads.
summary: Workers cleared fallen trees and shop owners swept up debris in Taiwan on Friday after one of the biggest typhoons to hit the island in decades claimed at least two lives. - Chinese ship grounded - Across the island, workers were up before dawn clearing trees, branches and other debris from roads.

title: Pakistan Airlines gets just one bidder, quotes PKR 10 billion for 60% share
content: The government's effort to privatise Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) failed as the only bidder, Blue World City, offered PKR 10 billion for a 60% stake, significantly lower than the PKR 85.03 billion minimum. The lack of competition and high government demands discouraged other bidders.
summary: The government's effort to privatise Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) failed as the only bidder, Blue World City, offered PKR 10 billion for a 60% stake, significantly lower than the PKR 85.03 billion minimum. The lack of competition and high government demands discouraged other bidders.

title: Mass shooting in Orlando amid Halloween festivities
content: A mass shooting in downtown Orlando early Friday caused panic among Halloween partygoers. The incident took place shortly after 1 am, involving several victims. Police and fire departments are investigating, with an update expected at 4:45 am. The number of victims and suspects have not been released yet. Further details are awaited.
summary: A mass shooting in downtown Orlando early Friday caused panic among Halloween partygoers. The incident took place shortly after 1 am, involving several victims. Police and fire departments are investigating, with an update expected at 4:45 am. The number of victims and suspects have not been released yet. Further details are awaited.

title: Seismic change in Botswana as party that ruled for 58 years loses power
content: Botswana's President Mokgweetsi Masisi conceded defeat after 58 years of ruling party dominance, with opposition candidate Duma Boko set to become president. The Umbrella for Democratic Change secured an overwhelming lead as economic challenges and unemployment issues swayed voters. Significant changes loom, with final results expected soon.
summary: Botswana's President Mokgweetsi Masisi conceded defeat after 58 years of ruling party dominance, with opposition candidate Duma Boko set to become president. The Umbrella for Democratic Change secured an overwhelming lead as economic challenges and unemployment issues swayed voters. Significant changes loom, with final results expected soon.

title: 'Not just Puerto Ricans were offended': Jennifer Lopez joins Harris' rally in Las Vegas
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and Jennifer Lopez appeared together in Las Vegas, urging voters to support Harris. Lopez criticized former President Trump’s recent Madison Square Garden rally, where speakers made offensive jokes about Latinos, including Puerto Ricans. Emphasizing unity, Lopez highlighted her pride as a Puerto Rican-American and her commitment to positive leadership.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and Jennifer Lopez appeared together in Las Vegas, urging voters to support Harris. Lopez criticized former President Trump’s recent Madison Square Garden rally, where speakers made offensive jokes about Latinos, including Puerto Ricans. Emphasizing unity, Lopez highlighted her pride as a Puerto Rican-American and her commitment to positive leadership.

title: Spain floods: Death toll surges to 150, crew search vehicles and flooded structures for bodies
content: Search teams in Spain continue to look for victims of catastrophic flash floods that have claimed over 150 lives. The disaster left widespread destruction in Valencia and beyond, washing away vehicles and damaging infrastructure. Rescue operations are ongoing, with many people still unaccounted for. Climate change is cited as a factor for the severity of the storm.
summary: Search teams in Spain continue to look for victims of catastrophic flash floods that have claimed over 150 lives. The disaster left widespread destruction in Valencia and beyond, washing away vehicles and damaging infrastructure. Rescue operations are ongoing, with many people still unaccounted for. Climate change is cited as a factor for the severity of the storm.

title: Tropical storm Kong-rey moves toward China’s coast after sweeping Taiwan
content: Kong-rey, downgraded to a tropical storm, expected to impact Shanghai and eastern China with severe rain and winds on Friday. The storm previously hit Taiwan, causing two deaths and extensive damage. Zhejiang, Fujian halted ferry services while most of Taiwan resumed operations. The storm follows Tropical Storm Trami's deadly path.
summary: Kong-rey, downgraded to a tropical storm, expected to impact Shanghai and eastern China with severe rain and winds on Friday. The storm previously hit Taiwan, causing two deaths and extensive damage. Zhejiang, Fujian halted ferry services while most of Taiwan resumed operations. The storm follows Tropical Storm Trami's deadly path.

title: Diddy's alleged sex tapes include minors: Key witness claims
content: Courtney Burgess testified in the Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs investigation, revealing that Kim Porter provided him with flash drives containing sex tapes, some involving minors. Burgess also shared details of Porter's memoir documenting abuse by Combs. Combs faces charges including sex trafficking, denies wrongdoing, and is detained pending his trial set for May 2025.
summary: Courtney Burgess testified in the Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs investigation, revealing that Kim Porter provided him with flash drives containing sex tapes, some involving minors. Burgess also shared details of Porter's memoir documenting abuse by Combs. Combs faces charges including sex trafficking, denies wrongdoing, and is detained pending his trial set for May 2025.

title: Did Kim Kardashian delete son Saint West's YouTube channel after anti-Harris post?
content: Kim Kardashian has removed her eight-year-old son Saint West's YouTube channel after he posted two controversial videos criticizing Vice President Kamala Harris. Saint's videos drew backlash featuring offensive memes and clips. Kardashian, who monitors his content, enforced their agreement rules by taking down his account, highlighting the family's contrasting political affiliations.
summary: Kim Kardashian has removed her eight-year-old son Saint West's YouTube channel after he posted two controversial videos criticizing Vice President Kamala Harris. Saint's videos drew backlash featuring offensive memes and clips. Kardashian, who monitors his content, enforced their agreement rules by taking down his account, highlighting the family's contrasting political affiliations.

title: Watch: Office of Sheikh Hasina’s coalition party attacked in Bangladesh, set ablaze
content: A violent mob vandalised and set fire to the Jatiya Party's central office in Dhaka after clashes erupted during a torch procession. Protesters condemned the Jatiya Party's ties with the Awami League. Police and army were deployed as the fire was contained. No immediate comment from the Jatiya Party.
summary: A violent mob vandalised and set fire to the Jatiya Party's central office in Dhaka after clashes erupted during a torch procession. Protesters condemned the Jatiya Party's ties with the Awami League. Police and army were deployed as the fire was contained. No immediate comment from the Jatiya Party.
